free_delivery.title: Free UK and EU delivery
free_delivery.text: Quickly get comfortable. Our strategically placed distribution centres enable us to speed up delivery times and improve our service so you can enjoy our products quicker and at no extra cost.

have_question.title: Have a question?
have_question.text: We pride ourselves on delivering the best customer service possible. For any assistance, talk to a customer service representative now via our chat feature, by telephone or by email.

klarna.title: Buy now, pay later
klarna.text: We do our best to make our products affordable and accessible to as many customers as possible, nobody should be left out! View our different financing and flexible payment options now.

sub_discount.title: Receive {{ currency_symbol }}15 off your first purchase!
sub_discount.text: Sign up for the latest news, access to exclusive deals, limited edition launches, product re-stocks and more.

hawk.text: “Couldn’t be happier, the cushions are so comfy, the chair is top quality and arrived the next day, really happy.”
hawk.name: Philip K

ultra.text: “My back feels so much better with the extra support and the quality of the chair is excellent.”
ultra.name: James B

hawk.text: This chair took my game to the next level, I can sit in comfort and concentrate for hours without getting tired, it’s amazing!
hawk.author: EmperorM

ultra.text: My game has really improved after using Duelhawk Ultra gaming chair, I feel a lot more support and don’t get tired. A great investment.
ultra.author: Aywalls

features_finishes.title:
Available in
two fresh finishes
features_finishes.text_1: We only use the finest materials in specific colours to maximise durability and provide the most comfortable experience. The PU leather features a slightly matt finish ensuring the chair looks new throughout its life.
features_finishes.text_2: Duelhawk superfine fabric chairs are made with one of the most durable and soft yarns available providing the perfect balance of durability, breathability and comfort. The fabric is very soft with a ‘felt’ feel to it.

hawk.text_1: Experience first class seating thanks to innovative memory foam technology which provides support for you back and the comfort to work and play long hours minimising fatigue. The Duelhawk HR moulded foam formula and unique production process provides better comfort, support and durability, this is why our products come with a 3-year guarantee as standard, which can be extended to 5 years with the Duelhawk Extended Warranty Program. Duelhawk HR molded foam formula is designed to deliver a density of foam that provides perfect posture support. This enables longer sitting times with less fatigue.

ultra.title_1: Superior comfort with adjustable lumbar support
ultra.text_1: All Duelhawk Ultra gaming chairs feature an integrated adjustable lumbar support mechanism. The lordotic curve is the lower part of the spine which naturally curves inwards whilst seated. Our unique lumbar support mechanism has been developed to prevent this and help promote good posture by filling the gap between the lower back and the chair, this not only allows your back muscles to relax but also provides the perfect position for longer seating times.

hawk.title: Key features
hawk.title_1: The best armrests in the game
hawk.text_1: Duelhawk 2nd generation 4D Armrests provide the latest in multi-directional comfort for the perfect seating position.
hawk.text_2: A perfect balance of firmness and comfort thanks to an exclusive Duelhawk HR moulded foam formula.
hawk.text_3: The Hawk gaming chair ships with low-density memory foam lumbar and neck support cushions.
hawk.text_4: By moving the point of recline from the centre of the chair to behind the knee enables you to keep your feet on the ground.

ultra.title: Key features
ultra.title_1: The best armrests in the game
ultra.text_1: Duelhawk 2nd generation 4D Armrests provide the latest in multi-directional comfort for the perfect seating position.
ultra.text_2: A perfect balance of firmness and comfort thanks to an exclusive Duelhawk HR moulded foam formula.
ultra.text_3: The Ultra gaming chair features a fully adjustable integrated  lumbar support mechanism.
ultra.text_4: By moving the point of recline from the centre of the chair to behind the knee enables you to keep your feet on the ground.

left.title: 3-year Warranty as standard
left.text: All Duelhawk chairs come with a 3 year Warranty as standard and can be extended to 5 years with our Extended Warranty Program for added peace of mind.
left.l1: Repair or replace all defective products
left.l2: Replacement parts sent free of charge
left.l3: Claim within 14 days of noticing a defect

right.title: Return/Refund Policy
right.text: Should you like to exchange or  return a product, you may do so subject to our Warranty Statement up to 14 days from the date of delivery and subject to return fees.
right.l1: Exchange or replace a product for free
right.l2: Return within 14 days of receipt of product
right.l3: Item must be in its original condition
right.button: Read full return and refund policy

list.qtitle_1: Which gaming chair is right for me?
list.title_1: Which gaming chair is right for me?
list.text_1:
The main difference between the Hawk gaming chair and the Ultra gaming chair models are the dimensions and features. 

The Hawk gaming chair was designed for small to medium users in mind, with a maximum height of 180 cm and weight of  110 kg. The Ultra gaming chair is capable of supporting users with a height of up to 200 cm and weight of 130 kg. The Ultra gaming chair is also more advanced with features such as built-in adjustable lumbar support for additional comfort.

list.qtitle_1: What ways am I able to pay for my order?
list.title_1: What ways am I able to pay for my order?
list.text_1:
We aim to provide all major payment methods.

You may pay for your order securely via Stripe using a debit card or credit card. Additionally, we also offer other payment options such as iDeal, Bancontact, Cartes Bancaires, SOFORT Banking and Przelewy24.
list.qtitle_2: How do I make a VAT exempt order?
list.title_2: How do I make a VAT exempt order?
list.text_2:
VAT exempt purchases are available to those who are eligible.

Please contact our dedicated support team so we are able to create a special order for you.

list.qtitle_1: Which countries do you ship to?
list.title_1: List of countries we ship to:
list.text_1: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and United Kingdom.
list.text_2:
Shipping is free on every purchase.

Duelhawk aims to provide excellent customer service which is why we include free tracked shipping on all orders.

list.qtitle_1: How do I extend my warranty?
list.title_1: How do I extend my warranty?
list.text_1:
The Duelhawk Extended 5-Year Warranty Program may be purchased on all products

To be part of the Duelhawk 5-Year Extended Warranty Program, simply add it to your cart at checkout. Please contact a member of our customer service team should you wish to add it after you have made a purchase.
Currently all our chairs are sent unassembled and will be built upon arrival. In an effort to simply the process, all Duelhawk chairs come with a clear set of instructions and assembly guide.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.l1: Free shipping on all orders to the EU & UK
shipping.l2: Tracking number provided on all shipments
shipping.subtitle: Return/Refund Policy
shipping.text: Should you like to exchange or  return a product, you may do so subject to our Warranty Statement up to 14 days from the date of delivery and subject to return fees.
shipping.ttext: All orders are sent using a trackable service where available. Shipping confirmation will be sent once a product has left our warehouse. Simply click on the link to view up-to-date tracking information.

questions.text_1: Our team is here 24/7 to answer any questions you have about our products, service or anything else. We’re here to help.

header.title: The Gaming Chair. Reinvented.
header.text: Slide into our chair designed for maximum comfort, helping you focus everything you have into the game.

dropdown.title3: Jet Black PU Leather Gaming Chair
dropdown.text:
- High quality materials
- Lumbar & neck support
- Flog-tilt mechanism
- Designed in Britain
